function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tracer gas concentration uniformity among and within rooms","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of air quality and contamination levels","Mitigation":"Conduct regular tests and inspections to ensure uniformity, and implement ventilation systems to regulate air flow","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, ventilation control systems","People":"Inhabitants, visitors, and workers in the houses","Owner":"Building maintenance and management team"},{"Description":"Strong stack effect in the Virginia house, resulting in uneven tracer gas concentration on each floor","Impact":"Uneven distribution of air and potential concentration of contaminants in certain areas of the house","Mitigation":"Implement ventilation systems to counteract stack effect and ensure even air distribution","Technologies":"Stack effect ventilation systems, air flow regulators","People":"Inhabitants, visitors, and workers in the Virginia house","Owner":"Building maintenance and management team"}]}
